phrases: - I will leave Horikiri-shi in your care.
When I looked into The Legend of One-Inch Princess,
I found out that using the lucky mallet is not enough.
In the original story, after the One-inch Princess used the mallet,
she prayed, facing the morning sun, at Akebono Cape and she became big.
Please, make me big, and return me to my original self.
Please return Chiyomi to her original self.
The day has finally come when I can return to my original self.
Ever since Minami-kun, who I have liked since when I was little, has rescued me,
I have felt happiness being close to the person I like, and sadness...
The Minami-kun that I like is not a coward like that.
You cannot do anything without me.
Being impatient with myself for not being able to do a thing.
- That you really like Chobiko... - I like Chiyomi.
I finally found out that Minami-kun was feeling the same way.
I want to get back to how I was... for Minami-kun.
Am I going to stay like this forever?
I am sure there is another way.
But... what else can we do?
he was so confident, but what is this?
Thank you for taking care of me during my stay.
Since we came all the way out here,
shall we skip school for a day and stay one more night somewhere?
He is not heading back now, is he?
I will Leave Horikiri-shi in your care.
In the original story, after the One-inch Princess used the mallet,
she prayed, facing the morning sun, at Akebono Cape and she became big.
Those two are definitely seeing each other.
Chiyomi, is there any place you want to go?
Where do you want to go?
I am going to tell my parents about what is been going on.
It is not like you cannot get back to normal forever.
I cannot continue to be your burden like this forever.
I do not think of it as a burden.
Minami-kun is talking to himself all this time.
Let us forget about each other when we get home.
You cannot become happy being with me like this.
There is nothing I can do for you.
I am saying it is okay.
I do not want to live being a burden to you.
Minami-kun, you will someday regret it.
I will regret more if I am not with you.
no matter how you are, I will protect you.
And I will not leave your side.

What are we going to do?
Hurry up and get in the car.
Maybe Onee-chan (big sister) did really turn into a dwarf.
There is nothing you can do right now.
We removed the bleeding in the brain.
There were no other damages, so all we have to do is wait for him to regain his consciousness.
I am sure there will be no aftereffect either.
Dr. Kawamura, thank you so much.
Since he is young, I am sure he will recover quickly.
I am sorry to have made you worry for a long time.
Asuka, why did not you tell us if you knew?
I said she might have become a tiny person.
You would not have believed me if I told you anyway.
She came home safely like this.
Hey, you are so small and cute.
I am so happy for you.
He is been asleep this whole time.
He just had the surgery yesterday...
The anesthesia has worn off a long time ago.
He should be awake by now.
Minami-kun has not regained consciousness yet.
My Little Lover Minami Kun No Koibito
He should be awake by now.
I was told that it is clearly not normal for him
to be in a coma for a long time like this.
But, was not he recovering nicely?
There is a chance that he would not regain consciousness.
Minami-san, the doctor wants to talk to you about our plans going forward.
Ricchan, may I ask you to (stay here) for a while?
Would you leave us alone for a little bit?
I was only thinking about myself.
Even if I could not get back to how I used to be,
I would have been happy just to be beside you.
Even if you did not wake up.

would return me to my original size.
There is no way that would work.

It is better to make these kinds of things clear.

Wow, you guys are so cute.
Chiyomi, Minami-kun, congratulations on your marriage.
They are members of the Tateyama No.1 High School Dance Club that the bride belonged to.
We got married as soon as we graduated from high school.
The dance you saw, which Chiyomi-chan used to dance, placed No.1 in last year's dance contest.
Next one up is Ueno Yuka-san, a freshman in the dance club, who is going to be the next leader.
She wrote a song for the two.
Yay, we can listen to Yuka-rin's song.
I am going to sing with all my heart, wishing happiness for your future.

Finally, we came this far, did not we?
It is like a dream even now.

N as if it wraps me aroundN
Straighten your back and get a hold of yourself.
You have been crying since the ceremony.
Well, when I think about many memories.
I just get overwhelmed with emotion.
When I think about it, it makes me cry.
I always thought they would end up getting together.
He is cute, is not he?
(onee-chan: it is used to call older women)
Are you next, Dad and Dr. Reiko?
You are a good match unexpectedly.
Oh, you look cute in it.
- I want to take a picture with you too, Takagi-san.
May I call you Onii-chan (big brother) from now on?
Well, your Onii-chan is over there, right?
- Riku, let us take another picture.
I should have taken a picture of Chiyomi when she was a tiny person.

Since the day I became small,
it is been exactly a year today.
I forgot to pack sweatpants and shoes.
What do you think you are going there for?
Minami-kun successfully entered a medical university where he could commute from home.
He became a medical student in April this year.
Well, I just moved to our neighbor's house though.
We have been having a sweet married-life.
It will be so hard for me to be away from you for two weeks.
Well, I sure will feel that way.
But, today, I am going to Tokyo
to participate in the dance workshop I was supposed to go to last year.
This time, you will work hard to become a dancing writer, right?
After I finish writing this, I will be going.
Are you about to finish it?
It is getting to the best part of the story now.
The big guy took Chobiko to a place.
Wow, this place brings back memories.
It seems as if it happened a long time ago.
It makes me remember the time when I became small.
It is not a well-made crown, but...
I want you to stay with me forever.
When she put her face on the big guy's chest,
She heard his heartbeat she used to listen to.
The two kept looking at the rainbow for a long time.
That was the same kind of rainbow that they saw when they were kids.
That rainbow might have been our future.
Chobiko is not in a pocket anymore.
